featured.text: It is an eco-friendly and biodegradable fiber.

definition.zh_def: 可生物降解的，指能夠在自然環境中被微生物分解的物質。
definition.en_def: Capable of being decomposed by biological processes, especially by the action of living organisms.
definition.example: These bags are made from biodegradable materials that break down easily in the environment.
